S

sendMessageAllClient(String) - Method in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
Sending a message to the output stream of each client.
sendMsg() - Method in class Chat.ClientFrame
If the client is connected to the server this method defines the fields of info instance of class ClientInfoSerialized with the corresponding data from the GUI components and then sends this instance in its serialized form to the server.
sendPrivateMsg(String, String, String, PrintWriter) - Method in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
Is called from a ClientThread instances (by some client) to send a private message to another client.
SerializeDeserialize - Class in Chat
This class has one method to serialize an object and one to deserialize.
SerializeDeserialize() - Constructor for class Chat.SerializeDeserialize
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class Chat.ClientInfoSeirialized
 
Server() - Constructor for class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
Initializing the list of the clients.
SERVER_PORT - Variable in class Chat.ClientFrame
Which port the server listening to.
SERVER_PORT - Variable in class Chat.ServerFrame
Which port the server listening to Make sure same port is specified in the ClientFrame file
ServerFrame - Class in Chat
The GUI class of the server window which also contains Server class and ClientThread class to run the server of the chat.
ServerFrame() - Constructor for class Chat.ServerFrame
Creates new form ServerFrame
ServerFrame.Server - Class in Chat
Server class manages the server socket and is the core of the chat.
ServerFrame.Server.ClientThread - Class in Chat
This class represents the connection between each client with the sever.
serverSocket - Variable in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
 
showOnline - Variable in class Chat.ClientInfoSeirialized
 
showOnlineClients() - Method in class Chat.ClientFrame
If the client is connected to the server this method defines the boolean field showOnline to be true of instance info of class ClientInfoSerialized.
socket - Variable in class Chat.ClientFrame
Socket object for the current client
startStopServer() - Method in class Chat.ServerFrame
Initializing a new thread with server class or completely terminating an existing one.
stopServer() - Method in class Chat.ServerFrame.Server
Terminating the server completely.
